name: Is Winter Real?
description:
Hello, friend!

"Is Winter Real?" is a short horror game made in five days for Winter Visual Novel Jam 2022. 

You find a weird machine with a mysterious AI, apparently designed to generate images based on the prompt you enter. 

Images can do no harm, right?

"Is Winter Real?" is a game about AI generated images, but we used no AI generated art. Everything is hand drawn, so you don't have to worry about ethical issues! :) 
It's a first project made by Coconut Dog Team - a group of nine friends from Poland, who share a passion for games and craft beer. We're mostly students and people working in fields that have nothing to do with gamedev - we have no experience, no free time and a lot of ideas.
